title: StandardGlobalNumericalAge
description: A standard numeric age point (a numeric analogue to a 'golden spike') is applicable to the formal subdivision of the Precambrian, and perhaps the Pleistocene/Holocene boundary ( http://www.stratigraphy.org/index.php/ics-chart-timescale). The boundary is not defined from a physical stratotype, although it can be influence by some, but placed at a convenient numerical value.
